resources.string:
Welcome to EmailAlbum Viewer.
 
 The main purpose of this application is to present you a slideshow from archive files containing pictures that you might receive in your Gmail Inbox.
 
 So, most of the time, you don't have to launch this app, Gmail will open it himself when you ask him to view a .zip or a .jar archive that you received attached in an e-mail.
 
 You might still want to launch EmailAlbum alone if you want to browse files located on your device filesystem (sdcard). If this is what you want to do now, you just have to hit the Menu button and select 'Open an album'.
 
 * This app was first developed to allow users of EmailAlbum to view their slideshows on Android devices. EmailAlbum is an opensource ultra-light de slideshow generator. These slideshows are compact enough to be sent by mail and can be run on any computer with Java SE installed (Windows, Mac, Linux...).
 http://emailalbum.googlecode.com.
An error occured while opening file :
Please wait while retrieving your album...
Error while building other intents menu.
Image files are too large to be displayed !
Let's try to display them one by one...

This viewer is brought to you by the author of EmailAlbum.

 It has been developed to allow users of EmailAlbum to open their albums on Android devices, but it can also open any zip archive containing pictures.

 EmailAlbum is an opensource multi-platform software allowing to simply pack a bunch of large picture in a compact multi-platform self-executable archive suitable for e-mailing.

 Visit http://emailalbum.googlecode.com for more details.
OI File Manager is required for both opening albums and saving pictures from/to SD Card. Do you want to install it ? (It is free)
Opening image in a different viewer. Use Back button to return to EmailAlbum Viewer
